name: Freshly baked cookies
description:
Game made in a week for Brackey GameJam 2022.1. By far my weirdest game. Eat a cookie and see where it takes you! It's a story game. There is multiple endings! 2 is multiple, right?

Which ending did you get? 

The theme of the Gamejam was: It is not real

Controls:

  • WASD To move
  • E to interact
  • Right Click to attack
  • Shift to sprint
